verses.name: Colossians 2:14
verses.text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;

verses.name: Colossians 2:15
verses.text: And having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

verses.name: Colossians 2:16
verses.text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat, or in drink, or in respect of an holyday, or of the new moon, or of the sabbath days:

verses.name: Colossians 2:17
verses.text: Which are a shadow of things to come; but the body is of Christ.
